name: DockX Skin
summary: Learn about .DSKIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To import skins into DockX, select "Import Skin" from the File menu, then select one or more DSKIN files to import. Several skins are included with DockX and are saved in the "DockX Skins" folder.

description: Skin that can be applied to the Mac OS X Dock using DockX; saved in a package format that includes multiple .PNG images and a .PLIST file; used to change the appearance of the Dock.
